title: Longfellow House Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours      Current Tour ScheduleThe Visitor Center is open Wednesday-Sunday from 9:30-5:00. Fifty-minute tours of the first and second floor start in the Visitor Center at 10:00 a.m., 11:00 a.m., 12:00 p.m., 1:00 p.m., 2:00 p.m., 3:00 p.m., and 4:00 p.m.From June 15 to September 4, we will offer twenty-minute Express Tours of the first floor only at 10:30 a.m., 11:30 a.m., 12:30 p.m., 1:30 p.m., 2:30 p.m., 3:30 p.m., and 4:30 p.m.Walking Tours of approximately one hour through our historic Cambridge neighborhood will be offered at 2:30 p.m., Wednesday-Saturday from July 1 to August 26 and Wednesday-Sunday from August 31-October 30. Twenty-minute tours of the historic landscape surrounding the house will be offered at 11:15 a.m. and 3:45 p.m., Wednesday-Saturday from July 1 to August 26 and Wednesday-Sunday from August 31 to October 30.Formal Garden Talk at 1:00 p.m. each Saturday.
